definition: unable to speak because of hereditary deafness
details:
adjective
- unable to speak because of hereditary deafness
= synonyms: dumb
- having a frequency below or above the range of human audibility
= example: having a frequency below or above the range of human audibility
- not made to sound
= example: not made to sound
= synonyms: unsounded
- failing to speak or communicate etc when expected to
= example: failing to speak or communicate etc when expected to
= synonyms: mum
- implied by or inferred from actions or statements
= example: implied by or inferred from actions or statements
= synonyms: tacit
- marked by absence of sound
= example: marked by absence of sound
= synonyms: still, soundless
